## transform() function

An alternative, simplified construction for creating [Transform streams](https://nodejs.org/dist/latest-v14.x/docs/api/stream.html#stream_duplex_and_transform_streams) May also use NodeJS [simplified construction](https://nodejs.org/dist/latest-v14.x/docs/api/stream.html#stream_simplified_construction)

<b>Signature:</b>

```typescript
export declare function transform<T = unknown, R1 = unknown, R2 = unknown>(transformer?: ChunkTransformer<T, R1>, flusher?: Flusher<R2>): Transform;
```

## Parameters

|  Parameter | Type | Description |
|  --- | --- | --- |
|  transformer | [ChunkTransformer](./transform.chunktransformer.md)<!-- -->&lt;T, R1&gt; | A function for transforming a stream chunk. May be async. |
|  flusher | [Flusher](./transform.flusher.md)<!-- -->&lt;R2&gt; |  |

<b>Returns:</b>

Transform

A [Duplex stream](https://nodejs.org/dist/latest-v14.x/docs/api/stream.html#stream_duplex_and_transform_streams)

## Example


```
import { transform } from '@commandville/transform'
import { pipeline as pl } from 'stream'
import { promisify } from 'util'

const pipeline = util.promisify(pl)

const toStringTransform = transform((chunk) => {
  return Buffer.isBuffer(chunk) ? chunk.toString('utf-8') : chunk
}, () => {
  console.log('FINISHED');
})

await pipeline([
  process.stdin,
  toStringTransform,
  process.stdout
])

```
